title: WTH RIOT NERF taliyah ?
body: Taliyah got nerf as well wtf  RIOT herE deals less damage to same target now ? Her Q already do that y u ruin %%% EW combo now -__-" that's some bullshit. W cool down increase WTF is wrong WTH you ? go fkin nerf some op champ and assassin What's wrong with %%%se noob decision ?

replies.body: Honestly i see it as an overall buff because they made the W so much easier to use (it uses vector targeting like rumble R and Viktor E)

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EVwAOcNL,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-07-12T23:44:25.117+0000)
>
> Honestly i see it as an overall buff because %%%y made %%% W so much easier to use (it uses vector targeting like rumble R and Viktor E)

i hate fkin new W its not easy its fkin hard compare to previous w TBH people who cant use skill shot its easy for them not for me
Her old W was comparable to not even using quick cast, so i don't see how vector targeting would pander to those who can't use skill shots.

the change to Q and the Q indicator is not good at all IMHO.

Was really enjoying playing her but post 6.14 she is a bit shite - probably a good thing I didnt pick up a skin.

> [{quoted}](name=Essembie,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EVwAOcNL,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-07-14T10:46:51.970+0000)
>
> the change to Q and the Q indicator is not good at all IMHO.
> 
> Was really enjoying playing her but post 6.14 she is a bit shite - probably a good thing I didnt pick up a skin.

i main her and I am really pissed off by riot Nerfing this champ, rather than Nerf zed/Yasuo or swain or Vald
She was one shotting squishes even with magic resist and its an unhealthy mechanic so glad its nerfed.
